traits.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If it dies, the tentacle returns to life in {@dice 1d6} days and regains all its hit points. Only a {@spell wish} spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (10d8 damage) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Spit Poison
entries: Ranged atk +8 to hit, range 15/30 ft., one creature. The target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (10d8 damage) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
